content_1: Azerbaijan. A new lab in the Khanlar region of Azerbaijan that can detect bird flu and other viruses opened in September. Twenty-six wild and 727 domestic bird samples have been tested so far and all were negative for bird flu according to the State Veterinary Service. Locations tested incuded Absheron Peninsula, Pirallahi Island, regions of Devechi, Salyan, Aghjabadi and Lenkeran.
